info.name: apply_video_frames_classifier
info.description:
A module that uses an eta.core.learning.VideoFramesClassifier to classify the
frames of a video using a sliding window strategy

inputs.name: input_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input VideoLabels file to which to add the predictions

outputs.name: output_labels_path
outputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing the predictions

parameters.name: classifier
parameters.description: an eta.core.learning.VideoFramesClassifierConfig describing the eta.core.learning.VideoFramesClassifier to use

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: the size of the sliding window in which to perform classification

parameters.name: stride
parameters.description: the stride of the sliding window

parameters.name: confidence_threshold
parameters.description: a confidence threshold to use when assigning labels

parameters.name: confidence_weighted_vote
parameters.description: whether to weight any per-frame-attribute votes by confidence
